column1: Ecco il file CSV con la classificazione richiesta.
Per la maggior parte delle voci
column2: la classificazione si basa sulla concordanza tra titolo e abstract. In un caso specifico (**W00110**)
column3: il titolo descrive esplicitamente un metodo PINN per MREPT (MRI)
column4: mentre il testo dell'abstract fornito nella fonte descrive uno studio CT; in questo caso ho dato priorit√† alle informazioni esplicite contenute nel titolo.

Physics-informed convolutional networks for synthetic MRI contrast generation.

Myo-DINO: A Physics Informed Neural Network for muscle MRI parameter mapping.

Unsupervised physics-informed deep neural network (IVIM-NET) for DWI/IVIM MRI.
Compares physics-informed unsupervised DNN against others for Multiparametric ASL MRI.
Physics-Informed DeepMRI for k-space interpolation in MRI reconstruction.

Self-supervised physics-informed DNNs (PINN) for phase-cycled bSSFP MRI relaxometry.

Physics-informed motion correction network (PI-MoCoNet) for brain MRI.
Unsupervised physics-informed deep neural network for tri-exponential IVIM MRI fitting.
Spatial-temporal information-driven physics-informed learning for DCE-MRI parameter estimation.

Physics-Informed Synthetic data learning Framework (PISF) for fast MRI reconstruction.

Physics-informed learning-based motion correction for gradient echo MRI.
